scenario_text.value: I’m going to save you, Sis.
That’s all I’ve ever wanted!
I’m counting on you, Gabumon!
Yeah! I got this!
I’m counting on you, Garurumon!
No problem! Leave it to me!
I’m counting on you, WereGarurumon!
Don’t worry, Akiharu! I’ve got this!
I’m counting on you, MetalGarurumon!

I know you are Akiharu. Now, let’s settle
this once and for all!

Miyuki! This time, I will do everything in my
power to save you!

Uh...hold on a second. Renamon, you do
remember what you used to be like, right?

Oh, come on. Renamon, that’s not right. Don’t
you remember what you used to be like?

Uh...Renamon, no. I think maybe you’ve
forgotten something.

Just a second. Renamon, I think there’s
something you’re forgetting.

Miyuki! This time I will do everything in my
power to save you!

Uh...hold on a second. Kyubimon, you do
remember what you used to be like, right?

Oh, come on. Kyubimon, that’s not right.
Don’t you remember what you used to be like?

Uh...Kyubimon, no. I think maybe you’ve
forgotten something.

Just a second. Kyubimon, I think there’s
something you’re forgetting.

Miyuki! This time I will do everything in my
power to save you!

Oh, come on. Sakuyamon, that’s not right.
Don’t you remember what you used to be like?

Uh...Sakuyamon, no. I think maybe you’ve

Just a second. Sakuyamon, I think there’s

Miyuki! This time I will do everything in my
power to save you!

Uh...hold on a second. Sakuyamon, you do
remember what you used to be like, right?

Oh, come on. Sakuyamon, that’s not right.
Don’t you remember what you used to be like?

Uh...Sakuyamon, no. I think maybe you’ve
forgotten something.

Just a second. Sakuyamon, I think there’s
something you’re forgetting.
What’s your point?
What’s your point?
What do you mean?
What are you talking about?
What are you talking about?

You don’t need to act like you’re Akiharu
anymore just because it’s Miyuki.

I’m saying you don’t need to pretend you’re
Akiharu anymore just because it’s Miyuki.

You don’t have to pretend to be Akiharu
anymore just because it’s Miyuki.

Just because it’s Miyuki doesn’t mean you
need to act like you’re Akiharu.

We’re going to bring back the real Miyuki.
You don’t need to be something you’re not.

This isn’t about making yourself her
protector, it’s about becoming equals again.
That’s what this fight is all about.

Yeah, you’re right. This is about getting
Miyuki back! About reclaiming my other half!

Yeah, you’re right. This is about getting
Miyuki back! About reclaiming my other half!

...Indeed. This is about getting Miyuki back!
About reclaiming my other half!

...That’s true. This is about getting Miyuki
back! About reclaiming my other half!

...That’s true. Thanks, Akiharu. Now, let’s
get Miyuki back! Let’s reclaim my other half!

Yeah! That’s more like it! Now come on, let’s
go!

Yeah, that’s it! You gotta be yourself! Now
let’s go!

Yeah, that’s it! The important thing is you
be yourself! Now, let’s go!

Right. That’s what will really make Miyuki
happy. Now, let’s go!
Yeah!
Right, let’s do this!
Here goes nothing!
Yes, here we go!
Yes, here we go!
